title: McDonalds typeface
content:
what is the typeface for the McDonalds ads?   
 [http://www.mcdonalds.nl/gfx/content/products/productpagina/mcchicken.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120204001454/http:/www.mcdonalds.nl/gfx/content/products/productpagina/mcchicken.gif)
author: anonymous

comments.content: I think it 's part of the Chalet Comprim

Looks an awfull lot like T-26's metsys   
   
 [http://www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f\_id=237](http://web.archive.org/web/20120204001454/http:/www.t26.com/fonts/display.php?f_id=237)
Metsys's captial M is not rounded, so I doubt it's that. Without a bigger sample, it's hard to tell, but I think Chalet Comprime is a good lead.
Chalet Comprime doesn't have the short lowercase i but it gets you close.
